sources.title: Vampire over London (1952) [Comedy] [Horror]
sources.description:
"Vampire over London", also known as "Mother Riley Meets the Vampire" or "My Son The Vampire" is a British comedy horror film. The film is about the mysterious figure known as the Vampire, who comes to England to complete experiments in his mad bid to gain control of the world.

---

Directed by John Gilling, produced by Stanley Couzins and John Gilling, written by Val Valentine, starring Arthur Lucan as Mrs. Riley, Bela Lugosi as Von Housen, Dora Bryan as Tilly, Philip Leaver] as Anton Daschomb, Richard Wattis as PC Freddie, Graham Moffatt as The Yokel, Mar√≠a Mercedes as Julia Loretti, Roderick Lovell as Douglas, David Hurst as Mugsy, Judith Furse as Freda, Ian Wilson as Hitchcock, the butler, Hattie Jacques as Mrs. Jenks, Dandy Nichols as Mrs. Mott, George Benson as Police Sergeant, Bill Shine as Mugsy's Assistant and John Le Mesurier as Scotland Yard officer.

---

Source: "Mother Riley Meets the Vampire" Wikipedia, The Free Encyclopedia. Wikimedia Foundation, Inc.. 2 June 2013. Web. 16 August 2013. http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Vampire_over_London.

If you like this movie and our channel, please subscribe: https://goo.gl/0qDmXe

sources.title: Vampire Over London (1952)
sources.description: Old Mother Riley is manaced by Bela Lugosi in this British comedy, a.k.a. "Mother Riley Meets the Vampire", re-released in 1963 as "My Son, The Vampire"

sources.title: Vampire Over London (1952) BELA LUGOSI
sources.description:
Stars: Bela Lugosi, Arthur Lucan, Dora Bryan 
 Director: John Gilling

 HOW THIS FOR GENIUS: The mysterious figure known as 'The Vampire" comes to England to complete experiments in his mad bid to gain control of the world. When the radar-controlled Robot he ordered is delivered mistakenly to Mother Riley, the Vampire, through radar control, has the Robot transport itself as well as Mother Riley to the proper destination. The old lady goes into a whirl of side-splitting action in a determined effort to frustrate the plans of the sinister Vampire!

 THEY JUST DON'T MOVIES LIKE THEY USED TO.

metadata.Plot: The mysterious figure known as the Vampire comes to England to complete experiments in his mad bid to gain control of the world. When the radar-controlled Robot which he had ordered shipped to him is delivered instead to Mother Riley, the Vampire, through radar control, has the Robot transport itself as well as Mother Riley to the proper destination...as the old lady goes into a whirl of side-splitting action in a determined effort to frustrate the plans of the sinister Vampire.
metadata.Actors: Arthur Lucan, Bela Lugosi, Dora Bryan
